resources.string: Write your numbers separated by a comma, we\'ll find a non-matching number

The application allows you to search for a mismatched number among the given ones. If an odd one appears among your even numbers or even numbers among odd numbers, it will be displayed. 
Rules: 
○ You must enter a minimum of 3 numbers 
○ Numbers must be integers 
○ Separate numbers with commas 
○ If you are entering even numbers, enter one odd among them 
○ If you are entering odd numbers, enter one even among them
There should be at least 3 numbers entered
There should be at least 3 integer numbers separated by commas and no other symbols
Entered numbers should contain one number not matching to the rest
